REGISTER.TITLE: Register
REGISTER.TERMS_ACCEPT: By signing up, you agree to our T & C and Privacy policy

ACCOUNT_NAME.LABEL: Company Name
ACCOUNT_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter an Company Name. eg: Wayne Enterprises

FULL_NAME.LABEL: Full name
FULL_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your full name. eg: Bruce Wayne

FIRST_NAME.LABEL: First Name
FIRST_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your First Name. eg: Bruce

LAST_NAME.LABEL: Last Name
LAST_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your Last Name. eg: Wyne

EMAIL.LABEL: Work email
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your work email address. eg: bruce@wayne.enterprises

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Woot Server, Please try again later
